Translations.Text: O vi kred vi ceter vigl mobilize as individu mobilize all together
Surely tie est those vi tren their fut tiam setback aflikt vi ili dir DI ben me ke mi ne martyred them
Vi ating ben DI ili dir as se neni friendship ever ekzist vi them Mi wish mi est them mi akci such great victory
Those readily batal ig DI est those forsake this mond Hereafter Whoever batal ig DI tiam gets killed ating victory ni surely grant him great recompense
Why should vi ne batal ig DI when weak hom women infan imploring Our Lord liver us el this community whose popol est oppressive est Vi our Lord Mastr
Those kred batal ig DI while those disbelieve batal ig tyranny. Do vi batal diabl allies diabl potenc est nil
